txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Craft a long-burning torch for the workers of Wildermore ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A skilled woodworker such as yourself can help the refugees of Wildermore by crafting a long-burning torch for them.

'You are a woodworker, are you not? Perhaps you can help us solve an issue we had, in which our torches smoulder too quickly in the snow.\n\n'Do you know of a way to make a sort of torch that will burn longer and brighter? The light of fire brings cheer in the cold nights....'
Hildelith has given you a recipe for a long-burning torch.\n\nYou should craft a long-burning torch for the survivors of Wildermore who fear the dark and cold.
'This is excellent woodworking here, [placeholder]! Thank you -- these torches will bring more light and warmth to Forlaw during the cold nights.'
Deliver the long-burning torch to Hildelith
Hildelith is in Forlaw.\n\nYou have crafted a long-burning torch and should now deliver it to Hildelith.
